title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message:
Have a macbook air (820-3024) white no happy apple startup sound. Where should i start troubleshooting?

ASD passed without any errors

title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message: Start by turning up the volume

title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message: Turning up the volume before starting the mac :P

title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message: Clean the board. Make PRAM reset. Boot OSX. Turn up volume. Restart. See if it chimes :-)

title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message: CPUIMVP_TON resistor. does this have cpu vcore?

title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message: Now i feel like lost in space... Im pretty new in motherboard.. How to check that CPUIMVP_TON have cpu vcore?

title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message:
It is working so TON resistor is fine. I assume you did a PRAM reset.

All audio circuitry is located on IO board so try new IO board and cable first.

title: [SOLVED]820-3024 no startup sound
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 4379"]It is working so TON resistor is fine. I assume you did a PRAM reset.[/QUOTE]

Feel me pretty stupid now.... it work with PRAM reset  ?
